body.name: Vanity Mirror with Lights, Hollywood Lighted Makeup Mirror with 3 Color Modes and 12 Dimmable Diamond LED Light Bulbs, 360° Rotation, Touch Control, White
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 1 hr 7 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: 【Exquisite&Unique Design】This lighted makeup mirror different from other vanity mirrors for the 12 sparkle diamond LED light bulbs, which not only makes the lighting more eye-friendly, but also provides an extreme beautiful, dreamy and luxurious visual effect. When the diamond lights on, you will feel like you are wondering in the stars. Perfect for your makeup routine and photographing.

【Adjustable Light Modes& Brightness】Our Hollywood vanity mirror has 12 pcs diamond LED bulbs with 3 color modes:cold white, warm white and warm yellow, and 3 lighting level. You can adjust the brightness and change whichever color as you like to meet your various makeup needs.

【Smart Touch Control & Memory Function】The Button on the mirror is super sensitive and durable. By simply touching the button on the screen, you can turn on/off the lights or change the color modes, and long press “P” button to adjust the brightness; Memory function makes this makeup mirror return to the same brightness it was on before being switched off.

【Trustworthy Quality】 The 12" L x 10" H vanity mirror with light which allows you to get your entire face in view at once and helps delicate making up. The LED diamond bulbs can be used continuously with 50,000 hours life span, 360°free rotation can fix at any position to give the most suitable viewing.

【Best gift idea】 Our Tabletop Mirror with diamond bulbs is both elegant and functional, an excellent present for daughter, girlfriends, fiancee, wife, and many other girls and ladies who pursuit beauty on Valentine’s Day, Christmas, birthday and other big days!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 147 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #32,222 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #143 in Personal Makeup Mirrors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This mirror rocks
reviews.reviewText: I love how compact it is and how bright the lights are. The mirror is perfect and shows every detail I need to see! There are three settings that works well and it make the perfect vanity mirror for my makeup storage setup. It’s light, plug and play, and capable to move from one location another. It’s perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super pretty!!! Definitely recommend!!!
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is amazing, you can either charge it(comes with charger) or put batteries in. It is dimmable, mirror is super clear. I put it on stand because I do my make up standing, but perfect size. I was afraid it wasn’t going to reach my expectations but it surpassed it. It makes my vanity look so much more prettier and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but cute
reviews.reviewText: i love how it doesn’t take up lots of space, it’s super light weight. easy to move. 3 light settings. good for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice mirror
reviews.reviewText: The mirror is really very nice, I bought it for my daughter, but when my wife saw it and tried it out she wanted one too. The mirror itself is very clear and not wavy at all, and is a real glass mirror. The light can go very bright and the color of the lights is perfect. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great performance for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mirror for my 7 year old granddaughter. She wanted to start playing with makeup like her older sister.First, the packaging was excellent and the mirror arrived with no damage. We got the 10" x 12" which is just right for her and her furniture. Lights are bright, but the dimming feature is really important and works well. Color modes are also a nice touch to match various lighting situations. Most importantly, she likes it and it allows her to play at "fixing up". Glad we found it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect just as pictured
reviews.reviewText: Love the size. It's perfect on my vanity. The light is bright and love the options of warm, natural and cool lighting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Lights went out in less than two months
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My daughter was so excited for this vanity mirror, but the lights went out in less than a month on minimal usage. She is so little and was terribly upset her present couldn’t even make it a few months. The mirror lights even stopped working before the return window broke, but I wanted to check to see if there may be something with it charging.Do not purchase as the return policy is absolutely horrible and they will not take back a defective product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality mirror
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice size and the lights are very bright. I bought it for my sister in college so it is a perfect size for her dorm room.
